subject: Attn:Beneficiary,
body:
Attn:Beneficiary,
Good News,
This is to apprise you that your funds has been approved for release
by Secretary General Ant√≥nio Guterres after a detailed review of your
payment file.
Waiting for your urgent reply via 
unitednationsamina@hotmail.com
UN Deputy secretary general,
Amina J. Mohammed.

subject: Re: Attn:Beneficiary,
body:
Hello there,

Wow, that sounds like fantastic news! I'm so thrilled to hear about this. Could you please provide me with more details? Like, how was my payment file selected for this approval? And what does the process involve?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: Attn:Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Winner.


As per your email.


We wish to congratulate you on this note for being part of our selected winners in our just concluded internal promotion draw this year, this promotion was set-up to encourage the active users of the Google search engine and all the email users by United Nations


Your email (xh13606@***.com) address is one of the lucky emails Selected randomly via E-wheel Computer Ballot System drawn from over 1Million companies and individual email addresses from all over the world.


We advise you kindly furnish me with your Name, Address, Occupation, Sex and Phone number so as to instruct you on how you can claim your funds



Waiting for your reply .


Amina J Mohammed .

subject: Re: Attn:Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Amina Mohammed,

Wow, this is such exciting news! I can't believe my luck. I'm always using Google search engine for all sorts of things, so it's great to know that it's paying off in such an unexpected way.

Could you please tell me more about this promotion? How many people were selected and what was the criteria? Also, how will the funds be delivered?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: Attn:Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Winner.


As per your email.

 Hundreds of people were Selected randomly via E-wheel Computer Ballot System drawn from over 1Million companies and individual email addresses from all over the world for using Google search engine ,that's the criteria .

The funds will be delivered via any preferred payment of your choice .


We advise you kindly furnish me with your Name, Address, Occupation, Sex and Phone number so as to instruct you on how you can claim your funds



Waiting for your reply .


Amina J Mohammed

subject: Re: Attn:Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Amina Mohammed,

Wow, this is such exciting news! I can't believe I've been selected. It's not every day that something like this happens to me. 

Could you please tell me more about how the Computer Ballot System works? And how was I chosen among so many people? It's all very fascinating.

Also, could you provide more details on the different payment methods available? I'd like to understand my options before making a decision.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Mary
